name: BMM_MODEL_ACCESS
documentation: Access to BMM models that have been loaded and validated from one or more schema sets.

schema_directories.name: schema_directories
schema_directories.documentation: List of directories where all the schemas loaded here are found.

all_schemas.name: all_schemas
all_schemas.documentation: All schemas found and loaded from `_schema_directory_`. Keyed by `_schema_id_`.

bmm_models.name: bmm_models
bmm_models.documentation: Top-level (root) models in use, keyed by `_model_id_`.

matching_bmm_models.name: matching_bmm_models
matching_bmm_models.documentation: Validated models, keyed by `_model_id()_` and any shorter forms of id, with some or no versioning information. For example, the keys `"openEHR_EHR_1.0.4"`, `"openEHR_EHR_1.0"`, `"openEHR_EHR_1"`, and `"openEHR_EHR"` will all match the `"openEHR_EHR_1.0.4"` model, assuming it is the most recent version available.

initialise_with_load_list.name: initialise_with_load_list
initialise_with_load_list.documentation: Initialise with a specific schema load list, usually a sub-set of schemas that will be found in a specified directories `_a_schema_dirs_`.

initialise_all.name: initialise_all
initialise_all.documentation: Load all schemas found in a specified directories `_a_schema_dirs_`.

bmm_model.name: bmm_model
bmm_model.documentation: Return model containing the model key which is a `_model_id_` or any shorter form e.g. model id minus the version. If a shorter key is used, the `BMM_MODEL` with the most recent version will be selected. Uses `_matching_bmm_models_` table to find matches if partial version information is supplied in key.

has_bmm_model.name: has_bmm_model
has_bmm_model.documentation: True if a model for a `_model_key_` is available. A model key is a `_model_id_` or any shorter form e.g. model id minus the version. If a shorter key is used, the Result s True if a `BMM_MODEL` with any version exists.
